mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PARENT_ID, CLASSIFY, PAGE_URI, SORT, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from page_tab
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into page_tab (NAME, PARENT_ID, CLASSIFY, PAGE_URI, SORT, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update:
update page_tab
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CLASSIFY = #{record.classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE_URI = #{record.pageUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update page_tab set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CLASSIFY = #{record.classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_URI = #{record.pageUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update page_tab
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CLASSIFY = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE_URI = #{pageUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update page_tab set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CLASSIFY = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_URI = #{pageUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from page_tab ft where EXISTS(select 1 from (select page_id from authority_page_rela rft where EXISTS(select 1 from (select authority_id from role_authority_rela rat where EXISTS(select 1 from (select r.id,r.name from role_tab r where EXISTS(select 1 from user_role_rela u where u.ROLE_ID=r.ID and u.user_id = #{id} ) and r.IS_DELETE='1') rt where rt.id=rat.role_id )) urat where urat.authority_id=rft.authority_id )) rrt where ft.id=rrt.page_id ) and ft.IS_DELETE='1'
